name: Prometheus Escape (Skamarox)
description:
Prometheus got a chance to escape his neverending punishment. Use your godly powers and reach the gate as fast as possible.

Controls:
Use mouse to navigate
WASD to move
Left mouse button to launch grappling hook
Right mouse button to shoot explosive fireball
R to restart
P to enter menu(Escape analogue)

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #19 by:
makkmygat - Unity development, programming
Farkprice - 3D-modelling, music, level design
